tasks.name: Insufficient headroom
tasks.description: The free height is much lower than the regulation (h = 2.10 m) it is necessary to move the facilities to comply with the regulation.

tasks.name: Wrong width
tasks.description: The structural model does not represent the original measurements within the detail drawing EST-001-V01.

tasks.name: Duct and Beam colision
tasks.description: Duct intersection with beam in grid 1 / P-C of the second level. Make a 45 degre bypass

tasks.name: Foundation error
tasks.description: It is necessary to modify the thickness of the foundations. Since it does not have the measurements of the last designer deliverables.
